definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)

sentences.english: I wanted to complain about them to the city of San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我決定向舊金山市政府提意見。

sentences.english: Thanks to Manchester City Council, he will never have to sit through another open-top bus parade.
sentences.chinese: 感謝曼徹斯特市政府，他可以不用在敞蓬大巴上慶祝。

sentences.english: The practice of new to the company plant represents municipal government of Suzhou of delegate of week person character congratulation.
sentences.chinese: 周人言代表姑蘇市政府對公司新工廠的歇業暗示祝賀。

sentences.english: The city government labels it “community-style management.”
sentences.chinese: 北京市政府稱它爲“社區式管理”。

sentences.english: No causalities have been reported, according to a statement issued by the municipal government Monday.
sentences.chinese: 沒有傷亡的報道，根據市政府本週一發表聲明。

sentences.english: The commerce Department has for many years been a stepchild of the city government.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來商業局一直不受市政府的重視。

sentences.english: To undertake other works assigned by the municipal government.
sentences.chinese: 承辦市政府交辦的其他工作。

sentences.english: The city government will give a dinner to welcome the foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 市政府將設宴招待這些外賓，以示歡迎。

sentences.english: Officials in Ofunato, a city in Iwate, advised residents to evacuate.
sentences.chinese: 巖手縣的大船渡市政府目前已建議居民撤離。

sentences.english: The city government has allocated money to help the schools cover the cost ofthe installation, state-run Xinhua news agency reported.
sentences.chinese: 新華社報道，市政府已經撥款幫忙學校支付安裝費用。

sentences.english: The residents all applaud the city government's decision to build more roads.
sentences.chinese: 所有的居民都贊成市政府多建設公路的決定。

sentences.english: In exchange, Paris, Chirac's government to withdraw the prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 作爲交換，巴黎市政府撤銷對希拉剋的起訴。

sentences.english: Because everything is nationally or municipally funded.
sentences.chinese: 因爲一切都是國家或市政府的資助。

sentences.english: The two-day weekend is set by the national government. Why is the municipal government entitled to change it?
sentences.chinese: 國家規定雙休，爲何市政府就能把這一規定更改？

sentences.english: The city government's efforts to improve traffic safety deserve merit.
sentences.chinese: 市政府在改善交通安全上所做的努力值得讚揚。

sentences.english: The dean to find weeks handsome, zhijiang wouldnt let him into the city at the door.
sentences.chinese: 帥飄要去找周院長，之江在門口不讓他進入市政府。

definition: li (Chinese unit of length equal to 500 meters)
administrative committee/management committee/abbr. for 管理委員會|管理委员会[guan3 li3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]

leading small group (LSG), a CCP body that exercises general oversight on matters relating to a specific area (LSG for foreign affairs 外事工作, LSG for comprehensively deepening reforms 全面深化改革 etc)/aka central leading group
secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
